SyncDataView.column_expression: xPCMName, xRecDate=convert(varchar(19),xRecDate,120), xCaller, xTheState, xjsjbh,xphonenum=case when left(xphonenum,1) in ('0','1') then '' else '0574' end + xphonenum
SyncDataView.search_condition: left(case when left(xphonenum,1) in ('0','1') then '' else '0574' end+ xphonenum,11) = '13867877813'
